name: The Creator and Creature
description:
An action RPG made to the 1 Room RPG Jam!

You are the Scientist that needs to protect his Creature.

Your objective is defend yourself from Peasants and built the Creature with their body parts.

Controls:

Get your weapon and use the Space key to attack.

Craft some wood parts with C key to barricade the windows.

Use E to get items and the Number keys to drop them.
